website_summaries.verdict: An affordable long-range water gun best suited for pool or beach use.
pros: Crafted from quality materials designed to withstand extended outdoor use
cons: Needs to be submerged in water for filling and reloading

customer_reviews.title: A bit underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: It squirts water so it does its job. As other reviews stated it doesnt squirt far at all, maaaaybee 30 feet. Its almost like the hole is too big because when you shoot it makes a big stream of water. A cheaper one would have served the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Not a squirt gun . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . but more a water cannon! I originally purchased this as a way to chase pesky birds from poolside. It very effective in that endeavor. I can nail a mourning dove from 25 feet away. And, if any kind of "water battle" should occur with other pool denizens, know that you will own the day. Great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lester8r

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to shoo the squirrels away from the bird feeder. Was hoping it would be able to be loaded and ready for use. Nope. Water leaks right out. So, this is more for a water fight / pool then for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: MBNagel

customer_reviews.title: 70 feet is more 30 feet
customer_reviews.text: The water gun is a fun and cool toy to play with. Why I gave it a 2 star is because it doesn't shoot as far as advertised. I doesn't shoot even half that far. But fortunately our pool is only 30 feet...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off on literally my second spray
customer_reviews.text: Crappy glue used to hold handle on. Broke first day. If you have strong enough hands you can still pull back and fire since you are pulling a tube instead of a handle. But my kids can't use it since they are small and weak. The crappy attachment of the handle sort of limits any fun you will have.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Another soaker
customer_reviews.text: Always have to have 2 just in case you're far away from the source, or if you really want to go get 'em. Shoots not that far, maybe 30-40ft. That's why I got the 24in.
customer_reviews.author: W. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water gun to use on my dogs when they bark outside for nothing. It does have the range but it doesn't keep water in it. Therefore it is not "ready" when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: teacherkaren

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: Good power Does leak a little out of nozzle, but who cares we’re in it to get wet These are my second set after three years of use! Sand and dirt can compromise smoothness so keep it clean
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend super fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing he could spend all his pool time playing with it I’ll even admit it’s super fun it shoots so long and high great and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: tzmommy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to shoot spotted lantern flies out of a tree. It didn't shoot a strong enough stream of water or last long enough to do the job. I'm using a hose, which works much better.
customer_reviews.author: anna4phil

customer_reviews.title: Works but cheaply build
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I am buying all 4, a four pack. That’s about what they are worth. Just cheap plastic squirt guns. We already had some at the pool, and I think I paid $20 for a four pack.
customer_reviews.author: michael bozuk

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as powerul as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to being capable of a stream of water for distances advertised. Only good for one quick shot about 15 feet of so. I would not recommend this for distance or accuracy of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This will chase those pesky cats from your yard forever ...
customer_reviews.text: This will chase those pesky cats from your yard forever without doing harm to them. One shot from the long range water stream and not my yard is cast free!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I got this to shoot out the window but water spills out everywhere - This is good for a pool and wet environment but for using in an apartment and shooting out a window it sucks, it leaks water everywhere every time
customer_reviews.author: Mike Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: Most poweful water gun I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: There is good & bad to that- it’s a bit too powerful. In shooting one friend at the town pool, the water is so strong it ricochets off & pretty much hits everyone within 10 feet. Need to monitor your kid with this one.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the crowd out of the yard!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t go quite as far as I’d like, but still helps keep the crowd out of the yard!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly one time before a plastic piece inside broke off & squirter started leaking everywhere! However, the single time it worked it shot pretty far & so I am requesting a replacement to see if the next one works any better. Plan to use this to chase a particularly bold squirrel from my bird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Get one with a trigger.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but a trigger type gun would be better!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbyk

customer_reviews.title: If I can rate this 10 stars I would...
customer_reviews.text: This water gun is amazing! It's powerful and it shoots a good sized stream! Its well made and feels durable and not cheap at all and it takes up a good amount of water for a long stream or a series of shorter bursts. Lets just say I had the best water gun in the family fun day!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Humane way to chase off back porch invaders
customer_reviews.text: My secret weapon for chasing off invading feral tomcats (and possums) invading my chummy little back porch clan. Doesn't spray terribly far, but does the job for small bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walls

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by photo - you only get 1 waterblaster
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed when only 1 arrived. The photo shows 4 water blasters and it’s not until u dig into the Q&A that it says there is only one. VERY misleading! Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome water sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome water sprayer. It shoots a long large stream, and I used it to shoot the bear that was at my bird feeder. Bears don't seem to like the water, so they vacate the spot. This water shooter is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water guns make good neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbor was mad our cat was getting in his yard so we gifted him one of these, he's happy, we're happy, the cat is not happy but still gets to go outside, 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I was fooled by the picture and thought this was ...
customer_reviews.text: I was fooled by the picture and thought this was for 4 water guns. This is for ONE! Way too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Great fun in the backyard....
customer_reviews.text: What a great toy for a hot summer day. I set up 2 buckets of water at opposite ends of the yard and the kids wear themselves out chasing each other back and forth. Product is quite sturdy, been dropped a million times, stepped on, whacked, etc...still works great. Highly recommend for any one looking to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: BigShopper

customer_reviews.title: It shoots a good stream of water a long way
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to drive the ubiquitous deer away w/o hurting them. It shoots a good stream of water a long way. Great gun!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We tend to buy a couple of this style water cannons every year for a neighborhood water war; parents vs. kids. These seem to hold up pretty darn well and are always the first to be plucked out of the arsenal as they are quick to load and shoot a lot of water quickly!
customer_reviews.author: T&T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fun
customer_reviews.text: Great kid pleaser. Just keep is out of the sand or you may render it useless
customer_reviews.author: bbeckham

customer_reviews.title: Must have for 4-10
customer_reviews.text: Great water gun for smaller kids, then buy longer ones for bigger kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten S. Ligeti

customer_reviews.title: Broke after the first use
customer_reviews.text: They were fun while they lasted. But, unfortunately, they didn't last long. The handles pulled off making it hard for little hands to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole B

customer_reviews.title: Would Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for pools! They are so simple and will always work! But beware of being sprayed in the eye. It hurts a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Y Belenis

customer_reviews.title: Good for various things around a ranch
customer_reviews.text: nice, I even used one to prime diesel from a day tank siphon tube
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy. Works very well and is surprisingly rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: MY MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: WAY OVER PRICED!!!! Manards had better product for LESS-than half the price!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NORA MOEDER

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money - this waterlines does not deliver
customer_reviews.text: This gun is terrible and does not shoots shorter than the waterlines from the $1. I’d say it goes about 32 ft. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Sause

customer_reviews.title: Sold separately
customer_reviews.text: Misunderstood the photo- thought it was a set of 4 so order 2 for a b day party- disappointed as we had 8 small guest
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great new sport.
customer_reviews.text: the perfect weapon for discouraging squirrels from digging up my backyard and fun to-boot.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kalbus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love 'em. They squirt further than any other water squirter I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Mom32

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I used this while floating down the lazy river. It can shoot water up to 7 meters long which is nice but in a river rafting water fight, I will suggest a longer water launcher for a better reach.
customer_reviews.author: Amy To

customer_reviews.title: Great water gun
customer_reviews.text: Certainly doesnt shoot more than 30 feet, but it does so with a good stream and accuracy. The seal is tight, so clean water is a must. The unit leaks, so you must be near your source of water and be ready to be wet.
customer_reviews.author: Terena T.

customer_reviews.title: Smokes Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie, I bought this to use it as a lung buster (look it up on Facebook). I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Huey

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: They work great and are loads of fun. I like the fact that you can unscrew the end and lubricate the plunger as needed. Nice
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: Great water launchers! Bought the middle size, would buy them again in the largest size to maximize striking distance :) However, the middle size was better for my 3 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jarzombek

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: bought it to squirt a mean big cat that is harassing our smaller cat......haven't had opportunity to use it for that yet...
customer_reviews.author: wally

customer_reviews.title: To shoot 70 feet as claimed I would have to have walk the first 45-50.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps mine had a urinary tract infection but it went from 2 trials to the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Garrard

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to scare wild turkeys off my bird ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to scare wild turkeys off my bird feeder. It doesn't come close to shooting water 70 feet. They just walk a little further and watch the water that never sprays them. If you're ordering this for the distance they advertise I would'nt get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Clemmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love these. Easily shoots a big stream of water. Lots of summertime fun!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Conigliaro

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a couple of weeks, but then the glue holding them together failed and they fell apart. Wish they were made better, they really work great while it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: J McD

customer_reviews.title: they are fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: took this floating it worked, well but it didn't survive the day, they are fun to play with, but its a one time use type of toy.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy buying for my family, we used these as stocking stuffers for Christmas and are looking forward to using them while rafting this summer
customer_reviews.author: Krestin Sharp

customer_reviews.title: affordable works fine
customer_reviews.text: affordable works fine, what can I say about this simple functional squirt gun. Now keep in mind it does not get a lot of use but we it seems to work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really shoot that far, BUT
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen the neighbor's cat since. I'm told it works great on skunks too. I'll post an update.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Bilge pump! FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as a bilge pump in our kayaks and it was fun to use to rinse off our feet along the river. 7day kayak trip was a success!
customer_reviews.author: K.Schnittjer

customer_reviews.title: Long range
customer_reviews.text: Not summer yet, but squirted it out the back door. Yep it travels a long way...
customer_reviews.author: Parker23se

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sure scares off those pesky squirrels away from the bird feeders...
customer_reviews.author: Di's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: It was well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grand daughters, and had them shipped directly to them. They have a BLAST when they're playing with these!
customer_reviews.author: Steffney L. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use while kayaking in teh Verde River - gives everyone a lot of fun. Shoots a surprisingly long distance!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Von Gausig

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: Love these, we have been having terrific water fights at our lakefront home!! Not just for kids!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and gives you a real good soaking. My 7 year old enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shooter but does not shoot as far as suggested. Still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird JMW

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Perform as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Only reaches 35 feet instead of the 70 feet claimed in the product information.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: simple design & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Like the heading says, this squirt gun is easy to use. I love the simple design as it means fewer parts to break. Plain & effective.
customer_reviews.author: 40WNKS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! both my 3 & 6 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Estella Lu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Picture is deceiving. Only includes one and not the four pictured. Not worth the price for just one.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Feick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but haven’t used it yet !! It is birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: john giittinger

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Not Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It works great -- use it for squirting unwanted squirrels and birds. Has a great range, though not quite the 70' advertised -- 50' nominal would be more accurate IMO. My reason for not giving it 5 stars is that unlike the old $3.99 Walgreens cheapie we had, could fill that one and lay it on our kitchen counter top for days with no leakage. This one leaves a puddle after a few hours, so when you fill it, ya better use it. Otherwise, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. John

customer_reviews.title: Read the description carefully
customer_reviews.text: When you order the 17 inch barrel by checking the middle box, you will actually receive the 12 inch barrel. It says so right in the product description below the check boxes. There is a mismatch of some kind on the web page.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great squirt gun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small kids to use and fun for adults too! I would recommend the larger size if your buying for older kids or adults. A must for canoeing.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Plenty effective
customer_reviews.text: We used it while rafting on the Upper Delaware river to assault other rafts with streams of water. It held up just fine to the abuse, and did it's job. It's effective range however is much less than the packaging claims. The longer ones are much better for range. (We were consistently out-ranged by them, but no matter that's what paddles are for.)
customer_reviews.author: Tony Digaetano

customer_reviews.title: Great water gun but breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: These guns are great fun for water play or in the pool but they are not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Laker Fan 67

customer_reviews.title: I like it fine
customer_reviews.text: I like it fine. The only thing about it is you can’t lay it down with water in it. The water pours out. We use it to try and scare the squirrels off our pool cage. By the time I fill it up the squirrels are all gone. It does a good forceful squirt.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: it worked really well. no problems with it .it is fast and easy to use.for the price you can not bet the result.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dufrene

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gun
customer_reviews.text: They are great. A ton of fun in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This water gun is made for fun but it also is great for making steam in a hot oven when baking bread! Couldn't bake sourdough loaves without it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be 4 for 12 dollars which would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be 4 for 12 dollars which would be reasonable due to being able to get the same type for a dollar at most dollar stores. Nothing in description specifies one gun. Would send back but ordered last minute for gift and have to give our nephew something.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We had fun with this. We were using it to shoot squirrels going after her bird feeders. Lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Bossler

customer_reviews.title: Single water gun!
customer_reviews.text: Only comes with 1 gun. I guess I didn't read the description close enough. I saw the picture of four, and thought it came with four. I would not have paid $12.49 for one single water shotgun like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: This price is for ONE Stream Machine, NOT 4 as shown
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 4 grandkids thinking each could have one water gun. Even though the picture SHOWS 4 water guns, I only received ONE! Nowhere in the product description does it say this price is for ONE Water Sports TL-600 Stream Machine. Just thought you should know.
customer_reviews.author: Maw Maw

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Y’all show 4 guns and I only got 2 not happy
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Prince

product_meta.title: Stream Machine Water Gun Launcher TL-600 17 Inch Single Barrel Water Launcher, Water Soaker Gun Shoots 40+ ft, Pool Squirt Gun for Outdoor Summer Fun, Colors may vary
product_meta.description:
Product description Get a grip and get wet with the Stream Machine. It's the ultimate water shooter able to shoot up to 70 feet! Each Stream Machine is made from high quality polymers. The colors are impregnated and will not chip or peel off. The Double Barrel shoots twice as much water in a single shot, up to 50 ft. From the Manufacturer The Water Sports TL-600 Stream Machine with a 12 inch barrel is the perfect choice in intense water war situations. Made with high quality polymers, this water launcher is made to withstand years of fun. Just simply dunk the barrel in a pool, lake, or bucket of water and pull the handle back making sure not to catch any sand or rocks. Once you've found your target, push the handle with force to create a steady stream sure to blast away the competition. With its ability to reach up to 70 feet and quick re-load of 2-3 seconds, your enemy will not get away dry. The removable cap allows the addition of foam accessories (sold separately). The Stream Machine comes in various colors and is suitable for ages 8 and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Water Sports TL-600 Stream Machine with a 12 inch barrel is the perfect choice in intense water war situations. Made with high quality polymers, this water launcher is made to withstand years of fun. Just simply dunk the barrel in a pool, lake, or bucket of water and pull the handle back making sure not to catch any sand or rocks. Once you've found your target, push the handle with force to create a steady stream sure to blast away the competition. With its ability to reach up to 70 feet and quick re-load of 2-3 seconds, your enemy will not get away dry. The removable cap allows the addition of foam accessories (sold separately). The Stream Machine comes in various colors and is suitable for ages 8 and up.
feature_bullets: SUPER SOAKING FUN: The Stream Machine Water Gun shoots a powerful steady stream of water with great accuracy, with a simple and easy to use design that you can take anywhere!
HIGH QUALITY: This water shooter is comprised of high polymers and vibrant colors that will not chip or peel, giving you a double barrel water launcher to last a lifetime
QUICK ACTION: For instant reloads, submerge the barrel in the water, pull back the handle and replenish your Stream Machine Water Gun to super soak your next opponent
NO ONE STANDS A CHANCE: At 17 inches long, with an 14 inch barrel that’s capable of extending to 26 inches, you can expect near perfect aim every time
SUMMER FUN: Perfect for swimming pool parties, river rafting, boating, as one of the favorite backyard toys and for beach and outdoor water play

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars244 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
